Room.Name: Plasnelt Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Plasnelt Road, just north of the Brownhaven Disposal Pits.
Room.LongDescription: There are several wagons pulled up at the gate, and some are waiting to enter while a few are just leaving. There is a gatekeeper holding a key and waving the wagons through. Looks like there is a small administration building for the disposal pits just to the east. On the north side of the road there is a stone cutter's place of business. A sign says, "Why not order your tombstone while you can enjoy it?"
